name: Antology (Skirlez)
description:
Our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
The game is about two ants that can join together to become stronger.
You must navigate underground while switching between the ants to progress.
At times you will need to join together to do things you can't do alone.


Good luck!

Note: The game might be slightly too loud. For your ears sake, remember to lower the volume down if it is.
